TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit CatalogPartCollection extends System.Collections.ReadOnlyCollectionBase
Public NotInheritable Class CatalogPartCollection Inherits ReadOnlyCollectionBase

summary.span: 包含 控制項集合，這個集合是用來提供使用者可以加入網頁中之 Web 伺服器控制項的類別目錄。

span.span: Contains a collection of controls used to provide catalogs of Web server controls that end users can add to a Web page.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別是唯讀的集合控制項，通常由來追蹤一組區域區域所包含的控制項。The class is a read-only collection of controls, typically used by a zone to track the set of controls contained by the zone. 當 Web 組件頁面輸入目錄模式時，建立新的區域物件，內含控制項。When a Web Parts page enters catalog mode, the zone creates a new object consisting of the controls. 每個集合中的控制項可以包含零個或多個 Web 伺服器控制項，這會顯示一份可用的伺服器控制項的表單中的參考。Each control in the collection can contain references to zero or more Web server controls, which are displayed in the form of a catalog of available server controls. 您可以建立如果您需要執行一組的某些大量作業，例如您自己以程式設計方式使用的控制項集合控制項。You can create a collection of controls for your own programmatic use if, for example, you need to perform some mass operation on a set of controls. 即使物件是唯讀的您可以透過程式設計方式變更集合中所參考的基礎控制項。Even though the object is read-only, you can make programmatic changes to the underlying controls referenced in the collection. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範了多個類別。The following code example demonstrates several uses of the class. 有四個部分，此程式碼範例：There are four parts to this code example: - 使用者控制項，可讓您變更 Web 組件頁面上的顯示模式。A user control that enables you to change display modes on a Web Parts page. - 自訂類別控制項，名為`TextDisplayWebPart`，這在網頁中參考，而且會包含在其中一個控制項。A class for a custom control named `TextDisplayWebPart`, which is referenced in the Web page and is contained in one of the controls. - 參考的網頁`TextDisplayWebPart`控制項，包含具有兩個控制項控制從在區域中，設定宣告的 Web 組件控制項，並包含事件驅動的程式碼建立及操作物件。A Web page that references the `TextDisplayWebPart` control, contains a control with two of the controls from the Web Parts control set declared in the zone, and contains event-driven code to create and manipulate a object. - 當您載入瀏覽器中，程式碼範例的運作方式的說明。An explanation of how the code example works when you load it in a browser. 在程式碼範例的第一個部分是使用者控制項。The first part of the code example is the user control. 使用者控制項的原始程式碼來自另一個主題。The source code for the user control comes from another topic. 對於此程式碼範例正常運作，您需要取得使用者控制項的.ascx 檔案[逐步解說： 在 Web 組件頁面上的變更顯示模式](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0)主題，並放置在此程式碼範例中的.aspx 頁面與相同的資料夾中的檔案。For this code example to work, you need to obtain the .ascx file for the user control from the [Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0) topic, and place the file in the same folder as the .aspx page in this code example. 在程式碼範例的第二個部分是`TextDisplayWebPart`控制項。The second part of the code example is the `TextDisplayWebPart` control. 若要執行程式碼範例，您必須編譯這個原始程式碼。For the code example to run, you must compile this source code. 您可以明確編譯它，然後將產生的組件放在您的網站的 Bin 資料夾或全域組件快取。You can compile it explicitly and put the resulting assembly in your Web site's Bin folder or the global assembly cache. 或者，您可以將原始程式碼放在您網站的 App_Code 資料夾中，這樣就會在執行階段進行動態編譯。Alternatively, you can put the source code in your site's App_Code folder, where it will be dynamically compiled at run time. 如需示範這兩種編譯方法的逐步解說，請參閱 < [ 逐步解說： 開發和使用自訂 Web 伺服器控制項](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08)。For a walkthrough that demonstrates both methods of compiling, see [Walkthrough: Developing and Using a Custom Web Server Control](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08). 請注意，控制項的屬性，名為`ContentText`; 這個屬性會保留使用者在文字方塊中輸入的值。Note that the control has a property named `ContentText`; this property holds the value that the user enters in the text box. [!code-csharp[WebParts_CatalogPartCollection_Overview#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_CatalogPartCollection_Overview/CS/textdisplaywebpart.cs#3)] [!code-vb[WebParts_CatalogPartCollection_Overview#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_CatalogPartCollection_Overview/VB/textdisplaywebpart.vb#3)] 在程式碼範例的第三個部分是網頁。The third part of the code example is the Web page. 請注意，``頁面的項目包含兩個宣告控制項。Notice that the `` element for the page contains declarations for two controls. 這些控制項，成為自訂的一部分時，會建立的物件`Button1_Click`方法執行。These controls become part of a custom object that is created when the `Button1_Click` method executes. 控制項包含具有先前已關閉的使用者在執行階段的 Web 伺服器控制項。The control contains Web server controls that have been previously closed by a user at run time. 中的控制項控制項可以加入至頁面。Controls in the control can be added back to a page. 控制項包含的自訂宣告`TextDisplayWebPart`控制項。The control contains a declaration of the custom `TextDisplayWebPart` control. 使用者在目錄模式中的頁面時，可以新增`TextDisplayWebPart`控制項至頁面，使用於一般的瀏覽模式。When the page is in catalog mode, a user can add the `TextDisplayWebPart` control to the page so that it can be used in normal browse mode. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_CatalogPartCollection_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_CatalogPartCollection_Overview/CS/catalogpartcollectioncs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_CatalogPartCollection_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_CatalogPartCollection_Overview/VB/catalogpartcollectionvb.aspx#1)] 當您載入瀏覽器中的時，您可以藉由選取成目錄模式切換頁面**Catalog**中**顯示模式**下拉式清單控制項。When you load the page in a browser, you can switch the page into catalog mode by selecting **Catalog** in the **Display Mode** drop-down list control. 您可以加入自訂控制項以選取它旁邊的核取方塊，然後按一下畫面**新增**。You can add the custom control to the page by selecting the check box next to it and clicking **Add**. 按一下 **關閉**返回頁面，即可瀏覽模式。Click **Close** to return the page to browse mode. 在控制項上您剛才新增，如果您按一下動詞命令功能表 （出現在標題列的向下箭頭），然後按一下**關閉**，是從頁面移除控制項，並將其加入控制項。On the control you just added, if you click the verbs menu (the down arrow that appears in the title bar) and then click **Close**, the control is removed from the page and added to the control. 將頁面傳回至目錄模式，然後按一下**頁面的類別目錄**連結以檢視的內容控制項。Return the page to catalog mode, and click the **Page Catalog** link to view the contents of the control. 請注意您現在關閉的控制項那里出現。Notice that the control you closed now appears there. 按一下 **顯示 CatalogPart 屬性**按鈕存取物件，並顯示內含之特定屬性控制項。Clicking the **Display CatalogPart Properties** button accesses the object and displays certain properties of the contained controls.

span.span: ASP.NET Web Parts Pages

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 區域，其中包含控制項通常是所建立的控制項物件，透過方法。The zone that contains controls is typically the control that creates a object, through the method. 不過，您也可以建立您自己基於其他程式設計的物件。However, you can also create your own object for other programmatic purposes.

span.span: ASP.NET Web Parts Pages

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新的空執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new, empty instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 建構函式初始化的空執行個體類別。The constructor initializes an empty instance of the class. 這個多載的建構函式會在內部使用類別在其方法來建立空的集合物件。This overload of the constructor is used internally by the class in its method to create an empty collection object. 區域再建立的所有執行個體控制項在子區域樣板中，宣告和使用內部集合的方法，將它們加入。The zone then creates instances of all the controls declared in the child zone template, and uses an internal method of the collection to add them. 您無法使用的這個多載建構函式建立的新執行個體，並新增給它的控制項。You cannot use this overload of the constructor to create a new instance of a and add controls to it. 您必須使用其中一個其他多載的建構函式改用。You must use one of the other overloads for the constructor instead.

span.span: ASP.NET Web Parts Pages

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Collections.ICollection catalogParts) cil managed

span.span: An of controls.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體，方法是傳入 控制項的 集合。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class by passing in an collection of controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 建構函式初始化的執行個體類別，並傳入的集合控制項。The constructor initializes an instance of the class and passes in a collection of controls. 這是一個多載可用來建立新的建構函式物件，並將給它的控制項。This is one overload of the constructor that you can use to create a new object and add controls to it. 雖然建構函式所建立的執行個體是唯讀的您仍然可以存取個別以程式設計方式控制集合中，並呼叫其屬性和方法。Although the instance created by the constructor is read-only, you can still access the individual controls in the collection programmatically and call their properties and methods. 使用這個建構函式的一個常見案例是如果您想要執行整組某些批次作業控制項，例如變更內容、 外觀或一組相關項目的位置。One common scenario for using this constructor would be if you want to perform some batch operation on an entire set of controls, such as changing the content, appearance, or position of a related group of items. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立自訂，並執行批次作業，若要變更個別控制項集合中，即使它是唯讀的。The following code example demonstrates how you can create a custom , and perform a batch operation to change the individual controls in the collection even though it is read-only. 完整的程式碼才能執行範例時，請參閱 < 範例 > 一節的類別概觀主題。For the full code required to run the example, see the Example section of the class overview topic. 中的程式碼`Button1_Click`方法會建立物件，新增兩個控制物件，頁面中，並接著建立新物件使用建構函式。The code in the `Button1_Click` method creates an object, adds the two controls in the page to the object, and then creates a new object using the constructor. 它也會示範如何對批次變更基礎控制項，即使集合本身是唯讀的。It also demonstrates how you can make batch changes to the underlying controls, even though the collection itself is read-only. 集合中，執行迴圈的程式碼更新每個控制項的屬性。The code loops through the collection, updating the property of each control. [!code-csharp[WebParts_CatalogPartCollection_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_CatalogPartCollection_Overview/CS/catalogpartcollectioncs.aspx#2)] [!code-vb[WebParts_CatalogPartCollection_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_CatalogPartCollection_Overview/VB/catalogpartcollectionvb.aspx#2)] 當您載入瀏覽器中的時，您可以藉由選取成目錄模式切換頁面**Catalog**中**顯示模式**下拉式清單控制項。When you load the page in a browser, you can switch the page into catalog mode by selecting **Catalog** in the **Display Mode** drop-down list control. 按一下 **顯示 CatalogPart 屬性**按鈕存取物件，並顯示內含之特定屬性控制項。Clicking the **Display CatalogPart Properties** button accesses the object and displays certain properties of the contained controls. 此外，如果您將滑鼠指標定位的框線內的標題文字控制項，您可以看到當您按一下 [（描述會出現在工具提示）] 按鈕時，已加入至控制項的新描述文字。Also, if you position your mouse pointer over the title text within the border of the control, you can see the new description text that was added to the control when you clicked the button (the description appears in a ToolTip). 如果您按一下**網頁型錄**連結可以顯示控制項，您會發現它也有更新的描述。If you click the **Page Catalog** link to display the control, you will find that it also has an updated description.

span.span: ASP.NET Web Parts Pages

ASP.NET Web Parts Pages

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance bool Contains(class System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart catalogPart) cil managed

param.name: catalogPart
param.span: 進行檢查的 ，以判斷是否存在於集合中。

span.span: A that is checked to determine whether it is in the collection.

summary.span: 傳回數值，表示集合中是否存在特定控制項。

span.span: Returns a value indicating whether a particular control exists in the collection.

returns.span: 布林值，指出集合中是否存在特定控制項。

span.span: A Boolean value that indicates whether a particular control is in the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法可讓您判斷是否特定的物件屬於物件。The method enables you to determine whether a particular object is part of a object. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何判斷是否特定控制項是隸屬物件。The following code example demonstrates how you can determine whether a particular control is a member of a object. 完整的程式碼才能執行範例時，請參閱 < 範例 > 一節的類別概觀主題。For the full code required to run the example, see the Example section of the class overview topic. 中的程式碼`Button1_Click`方法建立新名為物件`myParts`。The code in the `Button1_Click` method creates a new object named `myParts`. 此方法會使用方法，以判斷是否`PageCatalogPart1`控制項存在，而且如果是的話，擷取的控制項，並變更屬性值。The method uses the method to determine whether the `PageCatalogPart1` control exists, and if so, retrieves the control and changes a property value. [!code-csharp[WebParts_CatalogPartCollection_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_CatalogPartCollection_Overview/CS/catalogpartcollectioncs.aspx#2)] [!code-vb[WebParts_CatalogPartCollection_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_CatalogPartCollection_Overview/VB/catalogpartcollectionvb.aspx#2)] 當您載入瀏覽器中的時，您可以藉由選取成目錄模式切換頁面**Catalog**中**顯示模式**下拉式清單控制項。When you load the page in a browser, you can switch the page into catalog mode by selecting **Catalog** in the **Display Mode** drop-down list control. 新增自訂控制項以選取它旁邊的核取方塊，然後按一下畫面**新增**。Add the custom control to the page by selecting the check box next to it and clicking **Add**. 按一下 **關閉**返回頁面，即可瀏覽模式。Click **Close** to return the page to browse mode. 在控制項上您剛才新增，如果您按一下動詞命令功能表 （出現在標題列的向下箭頭），然後按一下**關閉**，是從頁面移除控制項，並將其加入控制項。On the control you just added, if you click the verbs menu (the down arrow that appears in the title bar) and then click **Close**, the control is removed from the page and added to the control. 將頁面傳回至目錄模式，然後按一下**頁面的類別目錄**連結以檢視的內容控制項。Return the page to catalog mode, and click the **Page Catalog** link to view the contents of the control. 請注意，您已關閉的控制項已經加入它。Notice that the control you closed has been added to it. 按一下 **顯示 CatalogPart 屬性**按鈕存取物件，並顯示內含之特定屬性控制項。Clicking the **Display CatalogPart Properties** button accesses the object and displays certain properties of the contained controls. 選取核取方塊中所包含的伺服器控制項旁邊控制項中按一下 **新增**以將它新增至頁面，然後按一下**關閉**返回頁面，即可瀏覽模式。Select the check box next to the server control contained in the control, click **Add** to add it back to the page, and then click **Close** to return the page to browse mode. 按一下 動詞命令功能表控制項上一次,，請注意，現在的關閉動詞命令已不存在。Click the verbs menu again on the control, and note that now the close verb is gone. 中的程式碼已移除`Button1_Click`方法中，當它用方法來檢查`PageCatalogPart1`，然後將其屬性設`false`。It was removed by the code in the `Button1_Click` method, when it used the method to check for `PageCatalogPart1`, and then set its property to `false`.

span.span: ASP.NET Web Parts Pages

MemberSignature.Value: public void CopyTo (System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart[] array, int index);

Public Sub CopyTo (array As CatalogPart(), index As Integer)

param.name: index
param.span: 放置集合內容的陣列起點。

span.span: The starting point in the array at which to place the collection contents.

summary.span: 複製集合至 物件的陣列。

span.span: Copies the collection to an array of objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會很有用，當您想要組合可以包含自訂陣列中的控制項物件或這些控制項的子集。The method is useful when you want to assemble a custom array that can contain the controls in the object, or a subset of those controls.

span.span: ASP.NET Web Parts Pages

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Empty As CatalogPartCollection

summary.span: 參考集合的靜態、唯讀和空執行個體。

span.span: References a static, read-only, empty instance of the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 靜態、 唯讀、 空白執行個體降低記憶體使用量，萬一您想要從方法傳回適當的物件類型，或比較的執行個體與另一個物件，空集合執行個體，但是您不需要將成員新增至執行個體。A static, read-only, empty instance of reduces memory usage in cases where you want an empty collection instance to return the proper object type from a method or to compare the instance with another object, but you do not need to add members to the instance.

span.span: ASP.NET Web Parts Pages

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance int32 IndexOf(class System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart catalogPart) cil managed

span.span: A that is a member of the collection.

summary.span: 傳回集合特定成員的位置。

span.span: Returns the position of a particular member of the collection.
A that is a member of the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會很有用，如果您有多個控制項在 Web 組件頁面，然後您要在集合中找出特定的控制項。The method is useful if you have multiple controls on a Web Parts page, and you need to locate a particular control in the collection. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何判斷成員的位置集合，使用其屬性。The following code example demonstrates how you can determine the position of a member of a collection by using its property. 完整的程式碼才能執行範例時，請參閱 < 範例 > 一節的類別概觀主題。For the full code required to run the example, see the Example section of the class overview topic. 中的程式碼`Button1_Click`方法建立新名為物件`myParts`。The code in the `Button1_Click` method creates a new object named `myParts`. 此方法會使用屬性來擷取位置控制項，然後再變更控制項的屬性值。The method uses the property to retrieve the position of the control, and then changes a property value on the control. [!code-csharp[WebParts_CatalogPartCollection_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_CatalogPartCollection_Overview/CS/catalogpartcollectioncs.aspx#2)] [!code-vb[WebParts_CatalogPartCollection_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_CatalogPartCollection_Overview/VB/catalogpartcollectionvb.aspx#2)] 在瀏覽器頁面載入之後，您可以藉由選取成目錄模式切換頁面**Catalog**中**顯示模式**下拉式清單控制項。After you load the page in a browser, you can switch the page into catalog mode by selecting **Catalog** in the **Display Mode** drop-down list control. 按一下 **顯示 CatalogPart 屬性**按鈕存取物件，並顯示內含之特定屬性控制項。Clicking the **Display CatalogPart Properties** button accesses the object and displays certain properties of the contained controls. 按一下 **網頁型錄**連結可顯示的內容控制項。Click the **Page Catalog** link to display the contents of the control. 請注意，它只有一個標題，而且沒有框線，因為其屬性值已變更為中使用的程式碼為其擷取控制項的屬性。Note that it has only a title and no border, because its property value was changed to in the code that used the property to retrieve the control.

span.span: ASP.NET Web Parts Pages

summary.span: 根據集合的位置或唯一識別項，傳回集合的特定成員。

span.span: Returns a specific member of the collection according to its position or a unique identifier.

MemberSignature.Value: Default Public ReadOnly Property Item(index As Integer) As CatalogPart

param.name: index
param.span: 集合中特定 的索引。

span.span: The index of a particular in the collection.

summary.span: 根據成員在集合中的位置，取得或設定集合中的成員。

span.span: Gets or sets a member of the collection, based on its position in the collection.

value.span: 位在集合中特定索引處的 。

span.span: A at the specified index in the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 索引子可讓您存取基礎中的控制項物件的索引，並變更其屬性值或呼叫方法。The indexer allows you to access the underlying controls in a object by index, and change their property values or call methods. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何存取的成員物件使用其索引。The following code example demonstrates how you can access a member of a object using its index. 完整的程式碼才能執行範例時，請參閱 < 範例 > 一節的類別概觀主題。For the full code required to run the example, see the Example section of the class overview topic. 中的程式碼`Button1_Click`方法建立新名為物件`myParts`。The code in the `Button1_Click` method creates a new object named `myParts`. 請注意，此方法會使用索引子來擷取集合的第一個成員的資訊。Note that the method uses the indexer to retrieve information from the first member of the collection. [!code-csharp[WebParts_CatalogPartCollection_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_CatalogPartCollection_Overview/CS/catalogpartcollectioncs.aspx#2)] [!code-vb[WebParts_CatalogPartCollection_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_CatalogPartCollection_Overview/VB/catalogpartcollectionvb.aspx#2)] 當您載入瀏覽器中的時，您可以藉由選取成目錄模式切換頁面**Catalog**中**顯示模式**下拉式清單控制項。When you load the page in a browser, you can switch the page into catalog mode by selecting **Catalog** in the **Display Mode** drop-down list control. 按一下 **顯示 CatalogPart 屬性**按鈕存取物件，並顯示內含之特定屬性控制項。Clicking the **Display CatalogPart Properties** button accesses the object and displays certain properties of the contained controls. 中可用的伺服器控制項的計數控制項使用來取得中的索引子`Button1_Click`方法。The count of available server controls within the control is obtained by using the indexer in the `Button1_Click` method.

span.span: ASP.NET Web Parts Pages

MemberSignature.Value: Default Public ReadOnly Property Item(id As String) As CatalogPart

param.name: id
param.span: 集合中特定 的唯一識別碼。

span.span: The unique identifier for a particular in a collection.

summary.span: 根據唯一字串識別項傳回集合成員。

span.span: Returns a member of the collection based on a unique string identifier.

value.span: 在集合中，ID 等於 值的第一個 。

span.span: The first in the collection whose ID equals the value of .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 索引子可讓您存取基礎中的控制項所使用的字串識別項的物件。The indexer allows you to access the underlying controls in a object by use of a string identifier. 雖然物件是唯讀的您可以變更屬性值，或在存取索引子的基礎控制項上呼叫方法。Although the object is read-only, you can change the property values or call methods on the underlying controls accessed by the indexer. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何存取的成員物件使用其字串識別碼值。The following code example demonstrates how you can access a member of a object using its string ID value. 完整的程式碼才能執行範例時，請參閱 < 範例 > 一節的類別概觀主題。For the full code required to run the example, see the Example section of the class overview topic. 中的程式碼`Button1_Click`方法建立新名為物件`myParts`。The code in the `Button1_Click` method creates a new object named `myParts`. 此方法會使用要擷取其資訊的索引子控制項，也就是第二個集合的成員。The method uses the indexer to retrieve information about the control, which is the second member of the collection. [!code-csharp[WebParts_CatalogPartCollection_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_CatalogPartCollection_Overview/CS/catalogpartcollectioncs.aspx#2)] [!code-vb[WebParts_CatalogPartCollection_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_CatalogPartCollection_Overview/VB/catalogpartcollectionvb.aspx#2)] 當您載入瀏覽器中的時，您可以藉由選取成目錄模式切換頁面**Catalog**中**顯示模式**下拉式清單控制項。When you load the page in a browser, you can switch the page into catalog mode by selecting **Catalog** in the **Display Mode** drop-down list control. 按一下 **顯示 CatalogPart 屬性**按鈕存取物件，並顯示內含之特定屬性控制項。Clicking the **Display CatalogPart Properties** button accesses the object and displays certain properties of the contained controls. 中可用的伺服器控制項的計數控制項使用來取得中的索引子`Button1_Click`方法。The count of available server controls within the control is obtained by using the indexer in the `Button1_Click` method.
